content:
QueryableDataSource Class

Definition

Represents a base class for data source objects that get data by using LINQ queries.

In this Article

[System.Web.UI.ParseChildren(true)]
[System.Web.UI.PersistChildren(false)]
public abstract class QueryableDataSource : System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource

Methods

CreateQueryableView()

Gets or sets the QueryableDataSourceView object that is associated with this QueryableDataSource control.

protected abstract System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView CreateQueryableView ();
Returns
QueryableDataSourceView

The default data source view that is associated with the QueryableDataSource control.

Gets the data source view that is associated with the QueryableDataSource object.

String

The name of the data source view to get.

Returns

The default data source view that is associated with the QueryableDataSource control.

Returns
ICollection

A collection of names that represent views that are associated with the QueryableDataSource control.
